languages.text: "Что, законодержец, эттфатер наделил{mf||а} тебя великой властью? Выйдешь ли ты еще на поле брани, или удовольствуешься теплыми покоями?"
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne is to become the new Marshal.

traits.locale_text: "Что, законотворец, эттфатер наделил тебя великой властью? Выйдешь ли ты еще на поле брани, или удовольствуешься теплыми покоями?"

languages.text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"
languages.translation_comment: Solomorne is to become the new Marshal.
languages.original_text: "Что, законодержец, эттфатер наделил{mf||а} тебя великой властью? Выйдешь ли ты еще на поле брани, или удовольствуешься теплыми покоями?"

traits.locale_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"
"So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"
"So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"
"So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"
"So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"
"So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"

languages.text: 「さて、法の番人よ。お前はアエット＝ヴァテルから偉大なる力を授かったのか？かつてのように戦場を行進するつもりか？それとも、執務室のぬくもりで満足するのか？」
languages.original_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"

traits.locale_text: 「さて、法の番人よ。お前はアエット＝ヴァテルから偉大なる力を授かったのか？かつてのように戦場を行進するつもりか？それとも、執務室のぬくもりで満足するのか？」

languages.text: "Also, Gesetzeshüter, hat der Aett-Vater Euch große Macht geschenkt? Marschiert Ihr auf das Schlachtfeld wie bisher, oder nehmt Ihr mit Eurer warmen Schreibstube vorlieb?"
languages.original_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"

traits.locale_text: "Also, Gesetzeshüter, hat der Aett-Vater Euch große Macht geschenkt? Marschiert Ihr auf das Schlachtfeld wie bisher, oder nehmt Ihr mit Eurer warmen Schreibstube vorlieb?"

languages.text: « Alors, gardien des lois, l'aett-vater vous a-t-{mf|il|elle} conféré un grand pouvoir ? Allez-vous reprendre le chemin du champ de bataille, ou vous satisferez-vous du confort de vos appartements ? »
languages.original_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, gardien des lois, l'aett-vater vous a-t-{mf|il|elle} conféré un grand pouvoir ? Allez-vous reprendre le chemin du champ de bataille, ou vous satisferez-vous du confort de vos appartements ? »

languages.text: «Dígame, legislador, ¿le ha otorgado {mf|el|la} Aett-Vater un gran poder? ¿Marchará al campo de batalla como otrora, o preferirá el acogedor calor de sus aposentos?».
languages.original_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"

traits.locale_text: «Dígame, legislador, ¿le ha otorgado {mf|el|la} Aett-Vater un gran poder? ¿Marchará al campo de batalla como otrora, o preferirá el acogedor calor de sus aposentos?».

languages.text: “和我说说吧，执法者，狼领是否赋予了你巨大的力量？你是会像以前那样奔赴战场，还是会安居于温暖的卧房？”
languages.original_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"

traits.locale_text: “和我说说吧，执法者，狼领是否赋予了你巨大的力量？你是会像以前那样奔赴战场，还是会安居于温暖的卧房？”

languages.text: "Söylesene kanun koruyucu, Aett-Vater sana muazzam güç bahşetti mi bari? Eskisi gibi cephelere akın edecek misin yoksa evinin rahatlığına iyice alıştın mı?"
languages.original_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"

traits.locale_text: "E kanun koruyucu, Aett-Vater sana muazzam güç bahşetti mi bari? Eskisi gibi cephelere akın edecek misin yoksa evinin rahatlığına iyice alıştın mı?"

languages.original_text: "So then, lawkeeper, has the Aett-Vater endowed you with great power? Will you march onto the battlefield as before, or be content with the warmth of your chambers?"
